name: "Mirror-Reflection Lyre"
description: A luxuriously adorned elegant model of lyre with strings blue as cut sapphires. It is the same design as the lyre model found in the Faded Castle. The mirror-symmetrical body of the lyre not only confers the kind of beauty that only symmetry can provide, but it makes it suitable for musicians of different handedness to play. Nowadays, the lyres widely embraced by bards have a very similar design to this lyre...
